name: Project: Dusk (Mobile)
description:
This is my first crack at using RPG Maker and I'm learning as I go. I would love any feedback or advice. This is an early access look at the game's prologue. It takes about 20-30 minutes. 

Note: This is the mobile version of the game with on screen button controls. A Desktop version is also available. 

How to play: 

Use the Arrow buttons to Move.  

A to Select. 

B to Access the In Game Menu Screen. 

Use a Two Finger Touch to Cancel or Go Back.
